pages.title: Symbology
pages.text: Drawing symbols with a $(item)Mystic Branch$() allows a practitioner to sculpt natural energies.$(2br)Only $(italic)Infused$() practitioners can use this type of magic.$(2br)Forbidden curses require the $(italic)Infernal Infusion$()

pages.title: Introduction
pages.text: First off, start by performing a $(item)Rite of Infusion$() to combine $(item)Mystic Unguent$() and an $(item)Ent Twig$() to get a $(item)Mystic Branch$().$(2br)To cast a spell, use and hold the Mystic Branch in the air, then wave it in a direction to draw a $(item)Symbol$(). If the symbols drawn represent the pattern of a spell, it will be casted upon release of the Mystic Branch.$(2br)Left click with the branch to deflect a spell projectile.

pages.title: Boosting power
pages.text: Spell power can be boosted by binding a $(item)Statue of Hobgoblin Patron$() and getting $(item)Hobgoblins$() to worship it instead of their Mog and Gulg. This worship gives the Witch more power but too many Hobgoblins may cause Mog and Gulg to notice and attack the Witch.

pages.title: Secret Spells
pages.text: Some spells are still unknown and might appear as blank pages or unreadable text. Once you find and draw the spell, their text will be revealed.$(2br)Also, Some spells require a certain knowledge to be used. Dealing with $(item)Flame Imps$() and $(item)Lord of Torment$() might shed light on the dark secrets of symbology.
